page.title: 07AN ALSAGER CORNER SHOP
page.content:
In Alsager there is a shop on the corner of Cross Street and Station Road. It sells food and sweets as well as table polish, shoe polish, fly spray, soap, dusters, mops and lots more. They have young and old people coming into buy their goods. They are generally busy but it does depend upon the weather. The people who work there, have worked there since 1953 which is 32 years. They are very nice and are always ready for a chat when you go in. It is quite a small shop but it has a lot of things in. It opens all day on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday. On Wednesday and Sunday it opens for half a day in case you need anything. They sell anything from flyspray to ice lollies.
By Maxine Russell and Debbie Round
